message: Let's split it evenly to start, no need to negotiate too hard!
You got lucky last round, but I'm not giving you a free pass!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more for myself to make it worth my while!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it! I'm taking a firmer stance now.
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just being realistic. Let's find a fair split!
You're running out of time, and so am I. I'm not backing down now.
I'm not giving up yet! I'll meet you in the middle, but I need a bit more for myself.
You're getting close to the deadline, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a bit more, but I need a fair share.
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience. Take it or leave it!
I'll take a small share, but I'm not going to give up without a fight!
This is it, Alice. Take the last crumbs or walk away with nothing. The choice is yours.
